member.name: T:Exploresoft.Tools.GaugeLibrary.Controls.BarGauge
member.summary: Exloresoft design bespoke .NET WPF gauges, and we specialise in creating robust and graphically intuitive controls at an affordable price. For more information about our products go to http://www.exploresoft.net
BarGauge

member.name: P:Exploresoft.Tools.GaugeLibrary.Controls.BarGauge.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum property value. There is no limit set for this property.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the gauge, by default it's set to 0 by incrementing this value the gauge will display graphically its position in the control never exceeding the maximum value.

members.member:
Summary: Sets the interactive speed ratio of the System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock that was created for this System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.
Parameters: containingObject: This object contains the System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock objects that were created for this storyboard and its children.
speedRatio: A finite value greater than zero that is the new interactive speed ratio of the storyboard. This value is multiplied against the storyboard's System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio value to determine the storyboard's effective speed. This value does not overwrite the storyboard's System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio property. For example, calling this method and specifying an interactive speed ratio of 3 on a storyboard with a System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio of

member.summary: Changs the speed of the animation clock
